customer_name: Regents Of The University Of Idaho
site_name: REGENTS OF IDAHO OF THE UNIVERSITY OF IDAHO

citations.narrative:
Section 2.38(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: Each research facility shall, during business
hours, allow APHIS officials: (1) To enter its place of business.
A facility representative was not available to allow access at 9:50 am on 07/15/2016.
